writer.name: 杰罗姆·霍茨基 Jérôme L'hotsky

introduction: Forced to get a job, an over-educated thirty-year-old from a privileged background has no other option but to accept a job as a security guard in a supermarket. To be accepted and blend in with his new colleagues, he hides his bourgeois education and education level, metamorphosing and learning the codes and customs of this unfamiliar working-class world. This obstacle race will soon turn into a life lesson. Soon, unexpected love appears around the corner of an aisle, bringing new cultural differences and more trouble.
